mapper.insert: insert into board (isnotice, title, content, writer, cno) values (#{isnotice}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{cno})
mapper.update: update board set isnotice=#{isnotice}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, moddate=now() where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, isnotice, title, content, writer, regdate, moddate, cno from board
